profile_summary: Detail-oriented and organized Warehouse Assistant with over 3 years of experience in inventory management, order fulfillment, and customer service. Proven track record in improving operational efficiency and accuracy in fast-paced environments. Adaptable professional with experience in diverse industries, including hospitality and warehousing, demonstrating versatility and commitment.

description: Handled customer inquiries and complaints professionally.
Maintained cleanliness and orderliness of the properties.
Coordinated with property owners for maintenance and repairs.
Ensured compliance with Airbnb policies and local regulations.
achievements: Increased overall customer satisfaction rate by 15% through proactive management and excellent service.

description: Assisted in inventory control and order fulfillment.
Maintained a clean and safe working environment.
Loaded and unloaded goods from delivery vehicles.
Performed regular stock checks and reported any discrepancies.
Collaborated with team members to meet warehouse targets.
achievements: Improved order fulfillment efficiency by 20% through effective inventory management.
